statements: DELETE FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 100 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM customer_information WHERE sign_up_status = TRUE AND phone_number = '+1234567890';
DELETE FROM savings_plans WHERE plan_id = 100 AND plan_start_date < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND signup_date < '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM customer_savings WHERE customer_id = '987e6543-a21b-45c6-d456-798512347000' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM plan_history WHERE action_date < '2022-01-01' AND action_type = 'ARCHIVED';
DELETE FROM customer_savings WHERE customer_id = 200 AND plan_id = 1;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount < 50.00;
DELETE FROM rewards WHERE plan_id = 200 AND reward_type = 'Discount';
